typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		currency_code_from as string,
		currency_code_to as string,
		currency_id_from as decimal(38,18),
		currency_id_to as decimal(38,18),
		day as timestamp,
		rate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> hlpExhangeRate
hlpExhangeRate filter(currency_code_to=='USD') ~> FltrUSDCurrency
FltrUSDCurrency sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'stage_hlp_exchange_rate_to_usd.parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> hlpExchangeRateUSD
